page.title: 08WEST WICKHAM PLAYGROUP
page.content: A playgroup is held in West Wickham for 3 to 5 year old children. It meets in the mornings for 3 hours and caters for about 20 children, numbers varying with the birthrate. A small fee is payable to help to cover costs and there are two paid helpers. Mothers are asked to help and a committee of parents looks after the finance and organisation. The aim is to encourage children to play together and to accept a more disciplined life before they start school at rising five. The children come from homes in West Wickham and also from other small villages.
